thread.title: Cheap Thrill: A Bright, Sensible Leather Bag
thread.title_full: Cheap Thrill: A Bright, Sensible Leather Bag -- The Cut

author: Indya Brown
title: Cheap Thrill: A Bright, Sensible Leather Bag
text:
Every Monday at the Cut, we're highlighting one great purchase that won't eat up your whole paycheck. If you're looking for something to splurge on instead, check back every Friday for one great purchase that's absolutely worth eating ramen noodles for the rest of eternity.
Everyone needs a sturdy leather bag, but finding a decently priced one made out of quality leather is no easy feat. Fortunately, Cos has an especially stylish under-$200 option that can withstand the hustle of your day-to-day routine. It’s not so big that it will become too cumbersome to carry, but if you don’t want to bother with carrying it over your shoulder, adjustable straps can transform it into a cross-body. Emphasize the bright color with a romantic white blouse and relaxed trousers.
Cos Leather Saddle Bag, $190
